title: The Prince Of Magicians (1901) Directed By Georges Méliès

sources.title: The Prince Of Magicians (1901) Directed By Georges Méliès
sources.description: The Prince of Magicians (1901) 'Excelsior!' Director: Georges Méliès Excelsior!, released in the United Kingdom as The Prince of Magicians, is a 1901 French silent comedy trick film, directed by Georges Méliès. It is listed as numbers 357–358 in Star Film Company's catalogues. Synopsis: A magician pulls a handkerchief from the mouth of his assistant. From the handkerchief, he pulls a large aquarium, and uses the arms of his assistant as a pump to fill it. The magician then pulls fish from his mouth to fill the tank. -From Wikipedia
